item.title: Comedian Matt Rife Buys Ed and Lorraine Warren’s Occult Museum That Houses Annabelle Doll in ‘The Conjuring’ Franchise
item.description: He plans to open it up to the public for tours and overnight stays.

item.title: The Warrens Face Their First Demon and Annabelle Doll Returns in ‘Conjuring: Last Rites’ Final Trailer
item.description: Ed and Lorraine Warren take on the “case that ended it all” in the fourth and final ‘Conjuring’ film, which releases in theaters Sept. 5.
